indent verb [T]
(SPACE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ]
  publishing to make a space at the edge or on the surface of something: be indented from Each new paragraph should be indented about two centimetres from the margin.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to begin a line of written or printed text after leaving extra space, compared with the place where other lines begin: Normally each new paragraph is indented.
